messages.message:
Hi All - question on AI Hub Chat feature .. from a possible customer use case..

`Question came up from one of our document process owners (+John Bigham).  In this solution, is there a way for us to know what users are asking and not getting responses for?` 

`Ie. If the agent does not understand the question based on our documentation, we want to make sure we have the ability to see what is being asked and work towards improving our documents.`

`-Bill`

Use case here is to use operating instructions for Data Center operators. They'd essentially ask the chatbot what the rules/procedures are for XYZ scenario.

We record all the user prompts, model responses and feedbacks (thumps-down) for both Chat and Chatbot.

However only with Chatbot, we are exposing the feedback to the the creator of the chatbot.  (Chatbot->View Analytics)

cc: @margaret.tomaszczuk
